text: Asɨ 12.10 Fl 2.3, Ib 13.1, 1 Pi 1.22, 2 Pi 1.7 dɨ hulaŋ iamɨgali limu hɨhɨle agɨlasaŋ mavɨn hekɨlɨ sɨbaŋ hɨnihalaŋ uami. Naludɨ isagalinalu imahalinalu agɨlasaŋ mavɨn hekɨlɨ sɨbaŋ hɨnilalaŋ hameŋ ala nulɨsaŋ avi mavɨn hekɨlɨ sɨbaŋ hɨnihalaŋ uami. Naludɨ nukeŋ ibi mɨŋaiahɨmɨlaŋ uami. Limu hɨhɨle agɨladɨ ibi pam mɨŋaiahaiaha saŋ lɨhalaŋ uami.
